snippet: The Hall of Fame trainer Bob Baffert, who had a heart operation in March, will saddle the 9-5 favorite Game On Dude in Saturday’s Breeders’ Cup Classic.
abstract: Hall of Fame horse trainer Bob Baffert, who had heart operation in March 2012, will saddle 9-5 favorite Game On Dude in Breeders’ Cup Classic.
lead_paragraph: The Hall of Fame trainer Bob Baffert, who had a heart operation in March, will saddle the 9-5 favorite Game On Dude in Saturday’s Breeders’ Cup Classic.

headline.seo: After Heart Attack, Baffert Plans to Keep Working Hard and Winning Big
headline.main: After Heart Attack, Baffert Plans to Keep Winning Big
headline.print_headline: After Heart Attack, Baffert Plans to Keep Winning Big
